lead_paragraph: A security breach has exposed the e-mail addresses of millions of customers for major banks and retailers.

headline.seo: After Security Breach, Firms Warn of E-Mail Fraud
headline.main: After Breach, Companies Warn of E-Mail Fraud
headline.print_headline: Firms Warn of E-Mail Fraud After a Breach

snippet: A security breach has exposed the e-mail addresses of millions of customers for major banks and retailers.

byline.contributor: Riva Richmond and Stephanie Clifford contributed reporting from New York.
